dnr-full-name.required: Enter the main applicant's full name
dnr-full-name.minlength: Applicant's full name must be between 3 and 250 characters
dnr-full-name.maxlength: Applicant's full name must be between 3 and 250 characters
dnr-full-name.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links

dnr-dob.required: Enter the applicant's date of birth
dnr-dob.before: Main applicant's date of birth must be in the past
dnr-dob.after: Enter a real date of birth
dnr-dob.date: Enter a real date of birth

dnr-nationality.required: Select the main applicant's country of nationality

dnr-visa-type.required: Select what type of visa the application was for
